---
title: Introduction to high-performance research computing in R
author: Marie-Hélène Burle
---

:::{.def}

This talk is an introduction to heavy computations in R.

It will cover:

- running R on the Alliance clusters,
- benchmarking R code,
- profiling R code,
- an introduction to parallel R,
- an introduction to using C++ through the [Rcpp package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/Rcpp/).

:::
